name: Gate Guide
description:
Guide the drone through the gates. You move the gates while the drone picks a path to go on. You will need to match your gate's opening with the drone's path.

Controls

  1. Move Gates Up = Up Arrow
  2. Move Gates Down= Down Arrow
  3. Toggle Text = Tab
  4. Start/Restart = Space

Music: Icelandic Arpeggios - DivKid
